meanings.sent1: Don't be a sumph and forget your umbrella on a rainy day.
meanings.sent2: The teacher scolded the sumph for not doing their homework.
meanings.sent3: The sumph thought it was a good idea to wear shorts in the snow.
meanings.sent4: His actions made him look like a sumph in front of everyone.
meanings.sent5: Being a sumph can lead to embarrassing situations.

meanings.sent1: The party was boring until the sumph arrived.
meanings.sent2: She felt like a sumph in her old, worn-out clothes.
meanings.sent3: The sumph always fell asleep during exciting movies.
meanings.sent4: The room lit up when the sumph entered with their bright smile.
meanings.sent5: Being a sumph doesn't mean you can't shine in your own way.

meanings.sent1: The sumph tripped over their own feet and dropped their books.
meanings.sent2: He felt like a sumph trying to dance at the party.
meanings.sent3: The sumph accidentally knocked over the display in the store.
meanings.sent4: She moved through the crowd like a sumph in a china shop.
meanings.sent5: Being a sumph in a graceful world can be challenging.
